State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 07A Where a shoulder condition exists for a distance of
1000 feet or longer, the W8-4, W8-9, W8-17 and W8-23 signs should be
supplemented with a Distance plaque (see Section
2C.55
). Where additional signs are
placed within 1000 feet of the end of the shoulder condition, the Distance
plaque should be omitted. Notes
